description:
Bounce a ball between a paddle and a bunch of bricks in order to remove the bricks before a timer runs down.

This is a visually dated Breakout clone, but it plays and works well, and has a lot of features. A pretty solid choice for this type of game.

I love simple games like breakout, I play games not for the challenge but as a distraction. I used to play breakout a lot on Wine. I uninstalled wine and wanted a breakout style game and saw this one and thought great. I installed it and I got about 1/3 into the first game and it seized up my laptop I had to shut down by closing the lid. I rebooted started the game and it happened again. I am going to uninstall it.

Este juego fue si no recuerdo mal uno de los primeros que se creó para linux con SDL. Y es un gran juego.

Era de los pocos juegos que iban muy suaves en linux. Lo que han cambiado los tiempos desde entonces!... A pesar de todos los avances, sigue manteniendo el tipo perfectamente.
Après avoir perdu la première balle le jeu passe en mode pause puis impossible de jouer
